q1.a: Yes! 100% free, forever. No credit card required, no signup needed, no hidden fees. All features are available to everyone.

q2.q: How many CVs can I analyze?
q2.a: Unlimited! You can upload and analyze as many CVs as you need, in batches of 10, 50, 100 or more.

q3.a: We support PDF, DOCX (Word), and plain text for both CVs and job postings.

q4.a: The platform interface is available in English, Portuguese, French, and Spanish. CVs can be in any language - our AI understands them all!

q5.a: Yes! We're GDPR compliant. Your data is encrypted, never used to train AI models, and stored only for your analysis session.

q6.q: Which AI models do you use?
q6.a: We support Google Gemini, OpenAI (GPT-4), Anthropic Claude, Kimi, and Minimax. You can choose your preferred provider or let us use the best available.

q7.q: Can I use this on mobile?
q7.a: Absolutely! ShortlistAI is a PWA (Progressive Web App). It works perfectly on mobile, tablet, desktop, and can even be installed as an app.

q8.q: Do I need to create an account?
q8.a: No signup required for candidate and interviewer modes! Simply start using the platform immediately. (Admin access requires authentication.)
